00036 typedef struct mos_time_
00037 {
00039    uint32_t sec;
00041    uint32_t usec;
00042 } mos_time_t;
00043 
00044 typedef void (*alarm_func)(void *user_data);
00045 
00056 #ifdef PLATFORM_LINUX
00057 typedef struct mos_alarm_
00058 {
00059    alarm_func func;
00060    mos_time_t time;
00061    void *data;
00062    struct mos_alarm_ *next;
00063 } mos_alarm_t;
00064 #else
00065 typedef struct mos_alarm_
00066 {
00068    alarm_func func;
00070    void *data;
00072    uint32_t ticks;
00074    struct mos_alarm_ *next;
00075 } mos_alarm_t;

00077 #endif
